name: Vapor (principyto, RedPandaFox)
description:
A game that we "PandaVerse-Gang" made for the Global Game Jam 2022

Daniel Cerda Cortes- Programming GOD

Alejandro Reza Garduño Rojo-Character artist, animator, environment artist, texture artist and level designer

Gerardo Hernandez Pacheco-environment artist and texture artist

Xavier Enrique Sierra González- 3D modeler

Aram de Jesus Hernández Pérez-Music composer

Order, Chaos. Destruction, Restoration. Fire, Water. In On the Fire's Edge two players play against each other on a local multiplayer. One needs to burn down the houses, while the other needs to restore them.
